entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
